opinion.completion_remarks: ;RE has 360 degrees iris bombe due to pupillary block. The Yag PI in RE appears to be non-functional, we will plan a repeat YAG PI in RE after retina clinic evaluation is complete. To document RNFL, GCC analysis also when the OCT is planned today in retina clinic. We will schedule HFA LE tomorrow morning / next visit. Continue Misopt BD in BE. POOR VISUAL PROGNOSIS  IN RE EXPLAINED,NEEDS STRICT SYSTEMIC CONTROL ; HFA LE followed by YAG PI by Dr Niranjana. No CF for the repeat YAG PI. We will reassess 1 week post repeat YAG PI;done.
